documentType: bureau of prisons count sheet and inmate roster
summary: This document consists of Bureau of Prisons administrative records from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, dated August 9-10, 2019. It includes a count sheet of inmates by housing unit and an inmate roster showing assignments, including several inmates on 'SUICIDE OR' (suicide observation) watch. The date is significant as it is the day before Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Inmate Roster and Suicide Watch Listings
events.description: An inmate roster from the Metropolitan Correctional Center shows several inmates assigned to 'SUICIDE OR' (suicide observation) status in various housing units.

events.title: Official Inmate Count
events.description: A Bureau of Prisons count sheet documents the official inmate census by housing unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, NY
keyFacts: The documents are dated August 9-10, 2019, the day before and the day of Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
An inmate roster from August 9, 2019, lists multiple inmates under 'SUICIDE OR' (suicide observation) status in housing units including E05-535L, E03-519L, and K12-064L.
A count sheet from August 10, 2019, shows a total inmate census of 758, with 4 inmates out-counted.
The documents are standard Bureau of Prisons administrative forms for tracking inmate location and status.
The Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (MCC New York) is the facility where Epstein was held and died.
